attributes.action: Take steps regarding domestic abuse and the law to ensure those who inflict abuse of any kind upon partners and children are sent to prison and recieve punishment befitting their crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many men and women in the UK commit crimes of violence against their partners and children. These people continue to reoffend as the punishments being given out are far too insignificant. Punishment should reflect the abuse and the long lasting damage it can do.

rejection.details: I realise your petition is not exactly the same as this one http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/stopabusers/ Have you considered adding your signature to it instead?
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
